dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Ready to continue your BioType training journey? Choose your next learning adventure.
dashboard.biotype_discussions_desc: Watch different AI Biotype agents debate and collaborate on a topic of your choice.
dashboard.biotype_recognition_desc: Train your ability to recognize BioTypes from images.
dashboard.enter_game_desc: Join the interactive philosophy world and chat with AI philosophers.
dashboard.conversation_history_desc: Review your past discussions and insights.
dashboard.profile_settings_desc: Manage your profile, subscription, and preferences.
dashboard.step_1_desc: Click "BioType Recognition Practice" to train your ability to identify biological temperaments from facial features and body language.
dashboard.step_2_desc: Watch different AI BioType agents debate and collaborate on topics of your choice in real-time conversations.
dashboard.step_3_desc: Review your recognition accuracy, response times, and conversation history to improve your BioType understanding.
